academyNarutoDark.name: Konoha Academy, Naruto Dark
academyNarutoDark.description: Welcome to Konoha, but before you start become a Genin at the Academy!

akatsukiTheme.name: Akatsuki Members
akatsukiTheme.description: The most wanted ninjas of the world, always using a cloak with red-blooded clouds.

borutoKonoha.name: Konoha: New Generations
borutoKonoha.description: Boruto Uzumaki, Naruto Uzumaki's son, the Seventh Hokage, signed up on the Ninja Academy to learn the true meaning of Will of Fire!

borutoKonohaFriends.name: Boruto: Konoha Friends.
borutoKonohaFriends.description: Mitsuki and Boruto are part of the new Team 7, together of Sarada and Konohamaru!

borutoMitsukiSnake.name: Boruto: Mitsuki (ミツキ).
borutoMitsukiSnake.description: Mitsuki! Only a transferred student who attended classes in Konohagakure to become a ninja.

borutoTheKages.name: Boruto: The Five Kages (影).
borutoTheKages.description: The Five Kages. One Kage (影) is a leader of one of the biggest five Occult Villages and generally are the strongest ninjas of their villages, although the ideology and their ideas, they're always willing to fight for Shinobi World!

discordPark.name: Discord **|** Your place to talk!
discordPark.description: Whether you’re part of a school club, a gaming group, a worldwide art community, or just a handful of friends that want to spend time together, Discord makes it easy to talk every day and hang out more often.

gogetaRage.name: Gogeta Supreme Power
gogetaRage.description: "I am calm and pure evil in heart, a warrior who never gives up and exceeds the limit, I represent the pride of my race."

gokuTransforms.name: I am Goku
gokuTransforms.description: How many died and I couldn't avoid, and to avoid that when time comes, I will fight, scream, Kamehameha!

happyPudim.name: Happy Pudding uwu.
happyPudim.description: Considering the food of the gods. I wanted to know why foods with faces are so cute my god (⁄ ⁄•⁄ω⁄•⁄ ⁄), gave me hunger just by looking...

inosukeSakuraForest.name: Fuyu no Isuke
inosukeSakuraForest.description: The cold is intense, but the trust in sight is right, trust that a new day will come.

kameHouse.name: Kame House
kameHouse.description: This is the house of our dear master Kame, a small house located in the middle of the sea on an island.

kimetsuTeam.name: Demon Slayer Team
kimetsuTeam.description: Hard work is the sum of daily efforts, and this friendship, is the result of this work.

kuraminhaHuman.name: Kyuubi no Kitsune
kuraminhaHuman.description: Have you ever heard of Kurama? Known for being a Kitsune, intelligent beings with magical abilities that increase with their age and wisdom. Imagine her humanized!

meliodasAndElizabeth.name: Meliodas & Elizabeth - Goddess and Demon
meliodasAndElizabeth.description: In a space between zero and one I will do, border! There my vague desires will meet...

meliodasVsZeldris.name: Two brothers, one throne, one destiny.
meliodasVsZeldris.description: Desperate to save the ones they love, two brothers fight for the throne. Who will win? Who will climb to the top? Who will free themselves of their suffering?

narutoAndSasuke.name: Sun and Moon of Konoha
narutoAndSasuke.description: "Someone told me I am a failure, and I will prove them wrong!"

narutoBestFriends.name: Naruto: Bonds
narutoBestFriends.description: "Brake the ties with my friends is not even an option!", ~ Naruto Uzumaki

narutoJinchuuriks.name: The Tailed Beasts.
narutoJinchuuriks.description: "They call us the Jinchuuriki. Who gave you the right to label us?! Who are you to decide someones destiny?!", ~ Naruto Uzumaki

narutoJirayaTeam.name: Jiraya: The heroes story
narutoJirayaTeam.description: "Understand the pain is what makes you be kind with others... Understand the pain is what makes us mature", ~ Jiraya.

narutoNagatoTeam.name: The Amegakure's Orphans
narutoNagatoTeam.description: The Ame's Orphans were three kids who lost their parents. Got together, until they got found by Jiraya, gave them food, shelter and taught them how to use ninjutsu so they can defend themselves.

narutoNarutoSmile.name: Naruto: Smile
narutoNarutoSmile.description:
"And my future dream is to be the greatest Hokage! Then the whole village will stop disrespecting me and start treating me like I'm somebody!",
~ Naruto Uzumaki

narutoOldTeam7.name: The Old Team 7
narutoOldTeam7.description: "In the ninja world, those who break the rules are scum, that's true, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum."

narutoOrange.name: My name is, Naruto Uzumaki! Datebayo, I am right!
narutoOrange.description: "I never go back on my word, that's my nindo! My ninja way!"

narutoUchihaOldGen.name: Clan Uchiha: Old generation.
narutoUchihaOldGen.description: Doesn't matter what type of human we are, it's only at the time of death that we discover our true nature, the true reason of our existence.

narutoUchihasNewGen.name: Clan Uchiha: New generation.
narutoUchihasNewGen.description: Doesn't matter what type of human we are, it's only at the time of death that we discover our true nature, the true reason of our existence.

narutoWillOfFire.name: Will of Fire!
narutoWillOfFire.description: "While I'm still alive, I wont let you die on a mission! If you are a Shinobi of the leaf, find your determination of Fire!"

tanjiroPower.name: Hinokami! Brothers
tanjiroPower.description: The heart is what moves people. So, my heart may have the strength you want!

tanjiroSwordRage.name: The only one who sees her as human
tanjiroSwordRage.description: It's ok to cry. It's ok to run away. Just don't give up.

tokyoDSDark.name: Demon Slayer Dark, Tokyo
tokyoDSDark.description: Tokyo, the capital of Japan, combines lights and colors with the traditional, from festivals and lights to historic temples.

lolBloodAkali.name: Blood Moon Akali
lolBloodAkali.description: I'm already thinking on the next target.

lolSilverAkali.name: Silverfang Akali
lolSilverAkali.description: We'll do it my way, fast and mortal!

lolTargon.name: Mount Targon
lolTargon.description: Stories say that the one that reaches the top is definitely blessed.

onePieceThousandSunny.name: A new journey
onePieceThousandSunny.description: And so, a new adventure begins for Luffy and his crew.

pokemonMimikyuPikachu.name: Pikachu?
pokemonMimikyuPikachu.description: A strange pokemon appeared, seems like a pikachu, right?

narutoLetsGoKurama.name: Naruto And Kurama
narutoLetsGoKurama.description: The start of a great friendship... Let's go Kurama!!

yourNameDestiny.name: Kimi no na wa
yourNameDestiny.description: I'm scared of forgetting everything one day... And that's because I now have a lot of important things to me.

hxhAnimePersons.name: Gon and your memorable friends
hxhAnimePersons.description: You will never meet someone entirely. If you want to know someone, find out what angers them.

narutoAfternoonOfKonoha.name: Afternoon Of Konoha
narutoAfternoonOfKonoha.description: A little after sunset, the beautiful leaf village is taken by winds and leaves, a serene place under a beautiful moon.

lofiStudentGirlBrasil.name: Lo fi Brasil: Listening to a song
lofiStudentGirlBrasil.description: Nothing better than to sit down and listen to a samba, a funk, a sertanejo? Study and pass the evening, this is the best medicine.

lofiStudentGirl.name: Lo fi: Listening a song
lofiStudentGirl.description: Nada melhor do que se sentar e ouvir uma musiquinha, estudar e passar a tarde.

discordWumpusBeach.name: Wumpus in Beach
discordWumpusBeach.description: Apenas tomando um solzinho, se refrescando neste calor, o dia está realmente lindo.

discordMinimalistWumpus.name: Minimalistic Wumpus
discordMinimalistWumpus.description: Sabia que o Wumpus não possuí amigos? Talvez você possa ser o primeiro amigo dele.

lolKDAPopStars.name: KDA Pop Stars
lolKDAPopStars.description: They could try but we’re gonna wear the crown, wish you luck but you’re not bringing us down. We go hard

onePieceBaratie.name: The floating restaurant! Baratie!
onePieceBaratie.description: O nosso dilema é, servir quem tem fome, os clientes são sempre prioridade. Quem estiver com fome, deverá ser tratado como cliente.

stevenUniverseIsland.name: Adventure on island.
stevenUniverseIsland.description: Esta ilha é habitada por várias criaturas mágicas, tem várias praias, uma cachoeira gigante e muitas árvores.

stevenUniverseFloatingIsland.name: Floating Island.
stevenUniverseFloatingIsland.description: Ah se você pudesse, sequer imaginar, viemos de além do Sol e Lua, até aqui chegar!

lolJaxDivine.name: God Staff Jax
lolJaxDivine.description: Após sua terra natal ser derrotada por sua própria arrogância ao libertar o Vazio, Jax e seu povo juraram proteger o pouco que restou!

demonSlayerShinobu.name: Shinobu Kocho!
demonSlayerShinobu.description: "Se as pessoas acreditam em tudo que ouvem, então não há diferença entre a mentira e a verdade"

fateSNRinEArcher.name: Rin And Archer
fateSNRinEArcher.description: "Meu lema é se eu tenho tempo para me preocupar eu tenho tempo para agir"

jujutsuKaisenParadaise.name: Jujutsu Kaisen Ending
jujutsuKaisenParadaise.description: "Perdido no Paraíso" - Ending Lost in Paradise feat. AKLO

onePieceZoro.name: Roronoa Zoro
onePieceZoro.description: "A lâmina mais forte é aquela que pode proteger o que você quer proteger e cortar aquilo que você quer cortar"

narutoUchihaBlood.name: Naruto: Uchiha Blood.
narutoUchihaBlood.description: "My name is Sasuke Uchiha. What I have is not a dream, because I will make it a reality. I'm going to restore my clan and destroy a certain somebody."

lolGalaxyZed.name: The Galaxy Slayer Zed.
lolGalaxyZed.description: "Kayn, in another life, you would have been a good pupil."

onePieceLuffy.name: Monkey D. Luffy
onePieceLuffy.description: "Eu não quero conquistar nada, só acho que a pessoa com mais liberdade do mundo é o rei dos piratas! E por isso, eu serei o Rei dos Piratas"

lolAkaliKDA.name: Akali: KDA Pop Stars
lolAkaliKDA.description: "Não há como deter oque está por vir. Regras só atrapalham, melhor deixá-las pra quem precisa. Não pensamos da mesma forma. Chegou a hora de você, aprender."

zenitsuDemonSlayer.name: Thunder Breathing
zenitsuDemonSlayer.description: Se eu dormir eu não, vou temer nenhuma assombração, vão sentir o poder do deus do trovão, eu não vou ter piedade até meus olhos abrirem

kakeguruiYumeko.name: Yumeko Jabami
kakeguruiYumeko.description: Eu não gosto de situações onde sei de certeza se vou ganhar ou perder. Porque isso não é verdadeiramente jogo

kimetsuRengokuVsAkaza.name: Rengoku Vs Akaza
kimetsuRengokuVsAkaza.description: Envelhecer e morrer é o que dá sentido e beleza ao tempo fugaz de uma vida humana. É exatamente porque envelhecemos e morremos que nossas vidas têm valor e nobreza.

sunsetGogeta.name: Gogeta
sunsetGogeta.description: Im neither Goku or Vegeta, I am the one in charge to defeat you
